main.name: Brandon Turner
main.description: I have been involved with software since I was 12 years old, I have been producing front end projects for clients since 2004 and full stack projects since 2014
main.bio: Software Engineer and 3D Educator with an aptitude for learning new technologies, a thirst for efficiency and a hunger to continually challenge myself.
main.contactmessage: Use the form below to send me an email and I will respond ASAP.

resume.skillmessage: I am proficient with Git, development operations and product management. I have used most technologies in respect to full stack development. I excel with Javascript, REACT.js, MongoDB, Git and product management.

education.description: Keeping myself current on the latest full stack technologies which were covered extensively at UCLA Extension
Great experience of higher education from Moorpark Community College.

Attended the WIT (Westlake Information Technology) Academy integrated with the high school. The program introduced us to front end development and visual basic in 10th grade. I also learned about video editing, graphic design and Microsoft Access.

volunteer.title: Software Engineer
volunteer.description: Apply the principles and practices of the digital age to improve how government serves the American public, and how the public improves government.

work.title: Education Specialist for the Americas
work.description: Managed education material, license servers and latest versions for schools in North/South America. Support for deploying Cinema4D in any environment, manage render servers on AWS, multiple cloud services and private configurations

work.title: Freelance Software Engineer
work.description: Working with clients ranging from small personal businesses looking to gain an online presence to long term contracts that need a specific task completed inside a hard deadline; I continue to exceed client expectations and deliver on time for them.

work.title: Trading/Technology Application Systems Admin
work.description: Manage communication and prioritization of projects with multiple departments with high dollar value liaison to Software Database Employees

projects.title: Hack for LA
projects.category: With a team we rebuilt this site using a more simple structure for easier updating. We were able to keep the same design using different technologies.

projects.title: Blitz Report
projects.category: You can take your Fantasy Football game to the next level! Track your favorite Quarterback's stats throughout the season with real-time updates. Utilizing express, body-parser, morgan, express-session, connect-mongo, passport, react-router, react-dom, react-router-dom.

projects.title: Van Cool
projects.category: OAuth secured app manages carpools for companies with van pooling services. MongoDB, Postman, Node.js, Express, bcryptjs, body-parser, concurrently, js-empty, jsonwebtoken, mongoose, passport, passport-jwt, validator, nodemon, mLab and REDUX.

projects.title: Resume Website
projects.category: A React based resume/portfolio website. Click here to view the technologies utilized listed in the readme on Git.

testimonials.text: Brandon is an all-around professional with the skills we needed to redesign and make our non-profit’s website beautiful. The only thing that matches his professionalism is his dedication to building an excellent product.

Brandon turned our run of the mill website into a digital masterpiece. We have received measurable results in search engine ranking as well as click-throughs because of the changes he implemented. We cannot thank him enough!
